*Claude Cattermole "Catsmeat" Potter-Pirbright
1:
--------------------
Text: Catsmeat Potter-Pirbright:  An actor also known as Claude Cattermole on stage or Claude Pirbright from his birth name Claude Cattermole Pirbright, he has the nickname Catsmeat (i.e. lights - lung-based cat food).
